description: 'The Housepainter':  From the scaffolding outside their bedroom window, hunky housepainter Roger spots a pair of lovers in their morning leave-taking. When one of the handsome pair splits for work and the other begins jerking his swollen prick, Roger pops into the room and the two studs start getting it on hot'n heavy. Joe Andrews returns unexpectedly...accelerating the action. Plenty of cocksucking and ass-packing all around, with two splattering loads to top off this wakeup treat!
title: Double Whammy, Scene #01
